friendLines.title: Hello
friendLines.description: I am Qiqi. I am a zombie. And I... forgot what comes next.

friendLines.title: Chat: Talking to Herself
friendLines.description: Hey, do you know what? Uhh... neither do I. I... already forgot.

friendLines.title: Chat: Afraid of Heat
friendLines.description: Let's go somewhere cooler.

friendLines.title: Chat: Training
friendLines.description: One, two, three, four. Two, two, three, four...

friendLines.title: When It Rains
friendLines.description: I forgot my umbrella again.

friendLines.title: When It Snows
friendLines.description: I want to build a snowman. Will you help?

friendLines.title: When the Sun Is Out
friendLines.description: I should have stayed indoors today.

friendLines.title: When It's Windy
friendLines.description: The wind is... frigid. I like it.

friendLines.title: When the Wind Is Blowing
friendLines.description: Hold my hand please. This wind could blow me away.

friendLines.title: Good Morning
friendLines.description: Morning means it's time to check my diary. Because my diary reminds me what I'm supposed to do in the morning.

friendLines.title: Good Afternoon
friendLines.description: I just remembered something. I forgot to help Dr. Baizhu prepare medications.

friendLines.title: Good Evening
friendLines.description: Good evening. How was your day? My day was... fine, I think. But I can't remember.

friendLines.title: Good Night
friendLines.description: It's time for you to sleep now. I will do my stretches. ...Do not watch me, please.

friendLines.title: About Qiqi
friendLines.description: Did you ask me something? Sorry... I forgot.

friendLines.title: About Us: Memory
friendLines.description: I have a poor memory for most things. But as far as I know, that doesn't matter.

friendLines.title: About Us: Memory Training
friendLines.description: I started memory training exercises recently. So don't worry, I won't forget who you are.

friendLines.title: About the Vision
friendLines.description: My Vision can't turn back time. But at least it gives me the power to protect the people that matter most.

friendLines.title: Something to Share
friendLines.description: I may be a corpse, but I am in a much better physical condition than Dr. Baizhu.

friendLines.title: Interesting Things
friendLines.description: Sometimes I see finches near the pharmacy. A nice little group of finches.

friendLines.title: About Baizhu
friendLines.description: I can never remember Dr. Baizhu's face. But I don't mind.

friendLines.title: About Hu Tao
friendLines.description: Warm. Fake smile. Death. I despise Hu Tao.

friendLines.title: About Xiao: Name
friendLines.description: Sounds like a historical artifact to me.

friendLines.title: About Xiao: Memory
friendLines.description: Remind me, have I met him before?

friendLines.title: About Xinyan
friendLines.description: ...Who?

friendLines.title: About Yaoyao
friendLines.description: Cute. Like a nice little finch.

friendLines.title: About Dusky Ming
friendLines.description: On some nights, I almost feel like someone is doing stretches together with me. But maybe I just have an overactive imagination.

friendLines.title: More About Qiqi: I
friendLines.description: What's going on?

friendLines.title: More About Qiqi: II
friendLines.description: I perform stretches regularly to help me maintain the same range of movement as a normal human being. But as soon as I stop doing them, the rigor mortis starts to set in again.

friendLines.title: More About Qiqi: III
friendLines.description: Some people want to take advantage of me. Others are terrified of me. But you... You are not like any of those people.

friendLines.title: More About Qiqi: IV
friendLines.description: Since we first met, I have had a warm feeling inside. Not the kind of warmth that makes me feel rotten. The other kind of warm. The one that happens inside my heart. Thank you. I am happy. Sadly I only recognize the current you. If I forget you... No. I will order myself to remember you.

friendLines.title: More About Qiqi: V
friendLines.description: In the past, my only thought was: I must stay alive. Even though I didn't know what to live for. But now, I think I know. I want to live with you. I want to ask, can we always stay together, for the rest of life, until death? Yes or no? Yes? Is that your real answer? Good, excellent. I promise to always protect you.

friendLines.title: Qiqi's Hobbies
friendLines.description: I want to have a pet. For example, a nice little finch.

friendLines.title: Qiqi's Troubles
friendLines.description: I don't know why, but high temperatures make me feel... disgusting.

friendLines.title: Favorite Food
friendLines.description: I like coconut milk... But, I don't know what it tastes like.

friendLines.title: Least Favorite Food
friendLines.description: Sorry, I have no idea.

friendLines.title: Receiving a Gift: I
friendLines.description: Cold. I like it. But, no flavor...

friendLines.title: Receiving a Gift: II
friendLines.description: Huh...

friendLines.title: Receiving a Gift: III
friendLines.description: It's burning my tongue...

friendLines.title: Birthday
friendLines.description: Many happy returns. Here is a bag of herbal medicine for you. You must be very surprised that I remembered? Let me explain. Last time you told me, I wrote your birthday down on a piece of paper. If I look at something once a day, it eventually goes into my long-term memory, and it will stay there forever.

friendLines.title: Feelings About Ascension: Intro
friendLines.description: Now, I have more power. But... what does that mean? Please explain. Thank you.

friendLines.title: Feelings About Ascension: Building Up
friendLines.description: Ah, I understand. When I get stronger, I need to put more effort into controlling my strength.

friendLines.title: Feelings About Ascension: Climax
friendLines.description: In the past, I did not understand the idea of being stronger than I already was. Now that I understand it well, I wish I was just a little stronger still.

friendLines.title: Feelings About Ascension: Conclusion
friendLines.description: All of this is because of you. Thank you very much. Can you make me a promise? From now on, please, let me protect you. Do you accept? Yes or no?

actionLines.title: Opening Treasure Chest: II
actionLines.description: Treasure chests... hmm... do we like treasure chests?

actionLines.title: Opening Treasure Chest: III
actionLines.description: Wasn't there something in here a second ago...?

actionLines.title: Fallen: I
actionLines.description: Don't want... to be sealed... back up...
